name: NeonScape (itch)
description:
Manoeuvre around the screen avoiding the cubes that are falling from above. If the player collides with the cube, the game and timer will reset.

NOTE: 

This game is only at a testing stage. The game will receive multiple updates in the future. If you spot any bugs, click the bug report button in the main menu.

TO COME:

- Global Leader board

- Character Customisation

- New sounds

- New menu's 

- More effects.

/!\ It has been brought to our attention that Anti-Virus may block the download, we are unsure of the cause of this and will be working on a fix in the near future.
